channel.title: NetNewsWire Releases
channel.description: Most recent NetNewsWire releases (not test builds).

item.title: NetNewsWire 7.0
item.description:
Changes since 6.2.1:
  • Adopted Liquid Glass UI
  • Improved window state restoration when sidebar is collapsed
  • Added custom About window
  • Changed link in the Help menu from Slack to Discourse

item.title: NetNewsWire 6.2.1
item.description:
Changes since 6.2:

  • Fixed some crashing bugs
  • Fixed a bug where, on some Macs, the user couldnâ€™t select an OPML file to import
